profile.name: Arifuzzaman Tanin
profile.about: I am a results-driven Full Stack Developer with 9 years of experience, specializing in .NET technologies (.NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, Web API, Azure, gRPC), WCF, Entity Framework, and CI/CD using Azure DevOps. Skilled in frontend frameworks (Vue.js, Angular, React), secure coding, microservices, and distributed architectures. I emphasize secure development practices, shift-left testing, and OWASP guidelines (OAuth, OpenID Connect, SAML). I excel in application development, legacy IT integration, and agile practices.
